column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Toph says : " You 're blaming me for this ? "
#Text=Aang says : " No !
#Text=" Toph says : " Hey , I never asked you for diddly - doo - dah .
#Text=I carry my own weight .
#Text=Besides , if there 's anyone to blame , it 's Sheddy over here !
#Text=" Aang says : " What ?
#Text=You 're blaming Appa ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Yeah , you want to know how they keep finding us ?
#Text=He 's leaving a trail everywhere we go !
#Text=" Aang says : " How dare you blame Appa !
#Text=He saved your life three times today !
#Text=If there 's anyone to blame it 's you !
#Text=You 're always talking about how you carry your own weight , but you 're not .
#Text=He is !
#Text=Appa 's carrying your weight .
#Text=He never had a problem flying when it was just the three of us !
#Text=" Toph says : " I 'm out of here .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Wait !
#Text=" Aang says : " What did I just do ?
#Text=I ca n't believe I yelled at my earthbending teacher .
#Text=Now she 's gone .
#Text=" Katara says : " I know .
#Text=We 're all just trying to get used to each other .
#Text=And I was so mean to her .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , you two were pretty much jerks .
#Text=" Katara says : " Thanks , Sokka .
#Text=" Sokka says : " No problem .
#Text=" Katara says : " We need to find Toph and apologize .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Okay , but what are we going to do about the tank full of dangerous ladies chasing us ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I have a plan .
#Text="
